data.name: Discouraged Workers - Extras
data.detailed_description:
Runs on Raspberry Pi


About the Game

  • Extras Vol.1 - Disc Labels
  • Extras Vol.2 - Wallpapers
  • Extras Vol.3 - Raspberry Pi Build
  • Extras Vol.4 - Android APK

Description

  • Extras Vol.1 - Formtec 16mm&40mm Label DGO, LightScribe Label LSL
  • Extras Vol.2 - 1920x1080 FHD Wallpapers(same as the Steam Profile Backgrounds with best quality)
  • Extras Vol.3 - Raspberry Pi Build(included only in the extras of the PC version)
  • Extras Vol.4 - Android APK(included only in the extras of the PC version)

Credits


Lee Yunseok: Directing, Design, Programming, Music, Sound, Writing, UI Design, Backgournd CGs, Object sprites, Packaging, Movie, Website -From April 21, 2013
chibilis studio: Animation, Character Sprites, CG Sprites -From March 10, 2015
Brian Connors: English Translation Adviser -June 3, 2015~July 1, 2017
Ga Younghee: English Translator -April 11, 2015~June 10, 2016
IVY: Chinese Translator -July 25, 2016~February 10, 2018
Roman Koledin: Russian Translator -August 28, 2016~December 7, 2017
Oscar Ballona Centeno: Project Leader in Spanish, Spanish Translator -From May 29, 2017
AxelBodga: Spanish Editor -From May 29, 2017
Yisus: Spanish Translator -From May 29, 2017
Adam Patric Kratz: Epilepsy Adviser -November 15, 2015~November 20, 2015

YANG: Male sprites, CG sprites -April 8, 2015~September 13, 2015
Jeon Junsik: Unofficial Demo Sprites -January 5, 2015~February 25, 2015
Kyle Fawcett: English Demo Translation Adviser -June 3, 2015~June 14, 2015

Thank You Letter


ACOC, Aiman Sharul, Axel Mertes, Bgame, Brandon Tanimoto, Brian Connors,
BRISAK Kim Doohyeon, cheif.choi, Choi Irang, Choi Jihye, clôture, Danielle Bell,
Edward N Puckering, Gary King, Gwak Jaeryeol, Han Ihyeong, Hoe Namyoon,
Hong Eunki, Hwang Daehoon, Hyojoon, James Emmerson, Jeong Dongwon,
Jeong Wookjin, Jeong Yoonsoo, Jianmin Zhang, Karina Schulze, Keira Val'Azr,
Kim Hanseol, Kim Hyeoncheol, Kim Jaeseong, Kim Jeongwoong, Kim Myeongwook,
Lee Changki, Lee Eunji, Lee Gunhae, Lee Hyejin, Lee Jaewi, Light Twins, Lim Jisoo,
Maddy Wootton, Marshall Proudfoot, Mirumu, Mojaeng, Oh Hyeonjun, Park Hyeonjun,
Park JoonKoo, Rewind, Sander Tieleman, srwss, Sung Chanaul, YottaCho, Zerial.net

Christopher Rice, George Winston, Kim Sooyoung, Lee Illseong, Pixabay, Shin Haechul,
So Reyeon, Tom Rothamel, Valve Corporation

This work was created by you. Yours Sincerely,
Lee Yunseok, Creator of YGGDRASIL STUDIO.

data.short_description: Discouraged Workers purchase exclusive DLC. Thank you for purchased the Discouraged Workers.
data.supported_languages: English, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows XP x86
  • Процессор: Pentium 4 1.66 GHz
  • Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: DirectX compatible card
  • Место на диске: 460 MB
  • Дополнительно: Android 4.2.1(Jelly Bean), WVGA(800*480 16:9 Wide Screen)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows XP x86, Vista or 7 or higher
  • Процессор: Pentium 4 2.1 GHz or higher
  • Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ
  • Место на диске: 1 GB
  • Дополнительно: Android 5.0(Lollipop) or higher, FHD(1920*1080 16:9 Wide Screen) or higher, LightScribe ODD, Formtec Design Pro, Adobe Acrobat Reader 5.0 or higher

mac_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Mac OS X 10.6.3 Snow Leopard x86
  • Процессор: Intel processor (IA-32)
  • Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ
  • Место на диске: 460 MB
  • Дополнительно: Android 4.2.1(Jelly Bean), WVGA(800*480 16:9 Wide Screen)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Mac OS X 10.6.3 Snow Leopard x64 or higher
  • Процессор: Core 2 Duo Yonah processor or higher
  • Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ
  • Место на диске: 1 GB
  • Дополнительно: Android 5.0(Lollipop) or higher, FHD(1920*1080 16:9 Wide Screen) or higher, LightScribe ODD

linux_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Linux x86
  • Процессор: Intel Celeron 700 MHz
  • Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ
  • Место на диске: 460 MB
  • Дополнительно: Android 4.2.1(Jelly Bean), WVGA(800*480 16:9 Wide Screen)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: SteamOS 2.20 Brewmaster, Ubuntu 12.04 LTS Precise Pangolin x64 or higher
  • Процессор: Intel or AMD 64-bit capable processor
  • Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: NVIDIA graphics card
  • Место на диске: 1 GB
  • Дополнительно: Android 5.0(Lollipop) or higher, FHD(1920*1080 16:9 Wide Screen) or higher, LightScribe ODD, 3-Heights™ PDF Optimization Shell, Raspberry Pi 3 Model B
